scripts.install:all: cd fe && yarn install && cd ../be && yarn install
scripts.build: cd fe && yarn build && cd ../be && yarn build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd fe && yarn dev" "cd be && yarn dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd fe && yarn start" "cd be && yarn start"
scripts.type-check: cd fe && yarn type-check && cd ../be && yarn type-check
